actions.name: Schooling
actions.description: Effect: While Wishiwashi's HP is higher than 1/2 their Max HP, they will be in School Forme. When Wishiwashi's HP is lower than 1/2 their Max HP, they will chance to Solo Forme and have a default EVA stage of +2.

system.description: Effect: While Wishiwashi's HP is higher than 1/2 their Max HP, they will be in School Forme. When Wishiwashi's HP is lower than 1/2 their Max HP, they will chance to Solo Forme and have a default EVA stage of +2.
